item.title: Writing Wednesday First Post
item.description: A few years ago, I wanted to start a blog. Anyone can write. All it takes is knowing a language and stringing words together. But learning to write well is a whole different story. Perhaps you’ve read a couple of books to improve your writing skills. And you’ve subscribed to the most popular blogs on writing. I didn’t start the blog then, and figured that it’s not too late to start now.
